highlights: Designed and delivered a secure Open Banking platform using React Native and a .NET backend, integrating Fiskil APIs/SDKs for OAuth-based user consent and real-time financial data synchronization.
Engineered event-driven webhook services with cryptographic signature verification, robust error handling, and Firestore-based caching and persistence on Google Cloud Platform (GCP).
Contributed to scalable backend architecture, clean API design, and production-ready cloud deployments.
Worked within an Agile development workflow using Jira and GitHub integrations.
Led continued development and optimisation of a secure Open Banking platform built with React Native and .NET.
Deployed and operated backend services on Google Cloud Platform (GCP), leveraging managed hosting and cloud-native infrastructure for scalability and reliability.
Drove Agile sprint execution using Jira while implementing GitHub integrations and CI/CD pipelines to significantly improve team productivity.
Led technical onboarding and mentorship of 3 software engineering interns, guiding architectural decisions and best practices.
Facilitated engaging and inclusive visitor experiences within a university-based exhibition space.
Communicated complex ideas clearly to diverse audiences including students, families, and community members.
Maintained a welcoming and safe environment while supporting interactive learning activities.
Conducted outbound welcome and transition support calls via Webex, guiding students through offer acceptance, enrolment, and onboarding processes.
Managed student interactions using a CRM system, maintaining accurate case notes and ensuring timely follow-ups.
Provided guidance on SATAC processes, credit transfers, study plans, and course enrolment issues.
Resolved complex enrolment scenarios and escalated cases to relevant university services where required.
Delivered clear, empathetic communication during high-volume admissions periods, contributing to a positive onboarding experience.
